definition[0]: a large weapon used in former times to throw heavy stones, iron balls etc
definition[1]: a small stick in the shape of a Y with a thin rubber band fastened over the two ends, used by children to throw stones
definition[2]: a piece of equipment used to send an aircraft into the air from a ship
definition[3]: to push or throw something very hard so that it moves through the air very quickly
example[0]: Sam was catapulted into the air by the force of the blast.
